en.home_description: Welcome to our Guest WiFi Portal. Please enter your name to request access to our Guest WiFi.
en.wait_waiting_description: Please wait until your request has been confirmed.
en.wait_waiting_refresh_text: The page will be updated automatically.
en.wait_result_access_permitted: You have been given access to the Guest WiFi for:
en.wait_result_access_denied: Your request was rejected. You will not have access to the Guest WiFi.
